plot: Documentary about Danish lawyers who are not always on their client's side, and who deliberately use them as cash machines. 69 year-old Else Bjørn and John Gregersen from Aalborg have both experienced the fraud of their lawyers.
title: Advokater på kant med loven?
plot_es: Documentary about Danish lawyers who are not always on their client's side, and who deliberately use them as cash machines. 69 year-old Else Bjørn and John Gregersen from Aalborg have both experienced the fraud of their lawyers.
plot_en: Documentary about Danish lawyers who are not always on their client's side, and who deliberately use them as cash machines. 69 year-old Else Bjørn and John Gregersen from Aalborg have both experienced the fraud of their lawyers.
